fdd:FDD.titleName: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence V210

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:fullName: MXF Generic Container with Uncompressed Video Essence V210

fdd:description.p: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the FOURCC code V210. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:shortDescription: MXF file with the Generic Container implementation for uncompressed video, with a picture essence structure identical to that identified by the fourcc code V210. This picture data is typically associated with soundtrack essences and, as available, timecode, closed captioning, and other elements.
fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:productionPhase: Generally employed in post-production or editing (middle phase) and in limited modes of dissemination (final phase).

fdd:relatedTo.fdd:titleName: MXF Generic Container Mapped to Uncompressed Images

fdd:relationship.fdd:comment: Audio and other essences of various types, not discussed at this time.

fdd:localUse.fdd:preference: None. For preservation reformatting, the Library of Congress' Packard Campus for Audio-Visual Conservation has chosen MXF_OP1a_JP2_LL (lossless JPEG 2000 wrapped in MXF operational pattern 1a).

fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:adoption: Moderate levels of adoption in professional production.
fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:transparency: Relatively transparent; requires tools to write and read.

fdd:values.fdd:note: SMPTE Universal Label (see SMPTE Metadata Registries (link available through Internet Archive)). The statement of equivalency to V210 is made in SMPTE standard ST 377-1, annex G.

fdd:citation.fdd:specReference: SMPTE 377-1-2011. Material Exchange Format (MXF) â€” File Format Specification; annex G.

fdd:urlReference.tag: SMPTE Metadata Registries (link available through Internet Archive)
fdd:urlReference.comment: Provides access to registry of SMPTE Universal Labels.
